sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均含"贵重的，有价值的"之意。
means: valuable ： 指有相当价值，可高价出售的，或有用、有益的东西。
precious ： 指因稀罕、不易得到而很值钱，或因本身的品质而具有极大的价值。

sentence.Network_en: It is not unknown for valuable display items to go, ahem, missing.
sentence.Network_cn: 贵重的展品，呃哼，丢失的话，会众人皆知。

sentence.Network_en: Now please be brief — my time is valuable.
sentence.Network_cn: 请长话短说——我的时间宝贵。

sentence.Network_en: The festival remains a valuable showcase for new talent.
sentence.Network_cn: 音乐节一直是新秀展示才华的宝贵机会。

list.abs: 宝开头的词语 | 常用词典 | 中华博物 ... ◆ 宝地[  treasure place ] ◆ 宝典[ valuable book ] ◆ 宝贵[  valuable precious ].
...夫妾关系，而在该关系下，女方于男方在生时已被男方的妻子接纳为其丈夫的妾侍，而男方家人亦普遍承认如此；“有值代价”(valuable consideration) 不包括婚姻或答应结婚的承诺；“有效婚姻”(valid marriage) 指─
采矿工艺mining technology有用矿物valuable mineral冶金矿产原料metallurgical mineral raw materials.
thank you very much for giving us your valuable time ., 我们占用了你宝贵的时间 , 非常感.

means.word_mean: 昂贵的,珍贵的,绝妙的,奢侈的,无比的,非凡的

entry.tran: 有价值的;有益的;有用的
entry.def: If you describe something or someone as valuable, you mean that they are very useful and helpful

example.ex: Many of our teachers also have valuable academic links with Heidelberg University...
example.tran: 我们的很多老师也和海德堡大学保持着有益的学术联系。

example.ex: If you decide to do you own make-up, here are a few valuable tips that will help you look your best...
example.tran: 如果你决定自己化妆，这里有一些有用的小窍门，可以帮助你呈现最美的一面。

entry.def: Valuable objects are objects which are worth a lot of money.

example.ex: Just because a camera is old does not mean it is valuable.
example.tran: 古旧的相机不一定就值钱。

means.word_mean: 1. having great material or monetary value especially for use or exchange;

sentences.sentence: "another human being equally valuable in the sight of God"

means.word_mean: 2. having worth or merit or value;
3. of great importance or use or service;

auth_sentence.content: Her "to do" lists are especially valuable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her "to do" lists are especially valuable.

auth_sentence.content: Sex appeal is just as valuable online as off.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sex appeal is just as valuable online as off.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sex appeal is just as valuable online as off.

auth_sentence.content: So they're aware of how valuable water is.
auth_sentence.res_content: So they're aware of how valuable water is.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So they're aware of how valuable water is.

stems_affixes.word_buile: valu价值+able能……的→adj.贵重的,有价值的 n.[n.]贵重物品,财宝
valu价值+e→n.价值,价格 n.&v.估价, 评价
valu价值+able能……的→adj.贵重的,有价值的 n.[n.]贵重物品,财宝
valu价值+e→n.价值,价格 n.&v.估价, 评价
valu价值+ate表动词→v.对……作估价,对……作评价
de下降+valuate[v.对……作估价,对……作评价]→v.[使]贬值
under下面+value价值→在原有价值下面→低估
e出+valuate[v.对……作估价,对……作评价]→出价值→评价

Sentence.sentence: Plus, importantly, the power source is rechargeable, so this does not involve using any valuable resources.

They're willing to do the hard work of identifying their valuable skills; be creative about where and how to look; learn how to present themselves to potential employers; and keep going, even after repeated rejections.
One problem is that time becomes more valuable and time becomes more worth money.
They argue that when a company like Monsanto goes to great expense to create a valuable new genetically modified seed, it must be able to protect its property interests.
The author takes walks and reads and loses himself in the stillness of the hermitage so that he can bring his wife and bosses and friends around him anthing valuable

means.word_mean: 贵重的, 珍贵的, 值钱的, 名贵的

sentences.en: He has a valuable collection of stamps.
sentences.cn: 他收藏了很有价值的邮票。

means.word_mean: 宝贵的, 有价值的, 极有用的

sentences.en: This is one of the most valuable lessons I learned.
sentences.cn: 这是我所学到的最宝贵的教训。

sentences.en: The book is valuable for my purpose.
The handbook is valuable to me.
sentences.cn: 这本手册对我很有价值。

sentences.en: She has put all her valuables in the bank.
sentences.cn: 她已把她所有的贵重物品存进了银行。

jushi.english: He has a valuable collection of stamps.
jushi.chinese: 他收藏了很有价值的邮票。

jushi.english: This is one of the most valuable lessons I learned.
jushi.chinese: 这是我所接受的最宝贵的教训之一。

jushi.english: Thank you for your valuable advice.
